AsyncOpSyndicationFeedFile.name: AsyncOpSyndicationFeedFile
AsyncOpSyndicationFeedFile.description: Represents the sync status of file-related information shared with external channels such as Facebook and Instagram.

AsyncOpSyndicationFeedFileNumber.description: ID assigned to each syndication feed file record, and used for tracking and reference purposes.

AsyncOperationTrackerId.description: ID assigned to the Async Operation Tracker record, which monitors and manages the lifecycle of the syndication process.

FeedContentBody.description: The content of the feed file that is syndicated to the external platform.

FeedContentContentType.description: Specifies the format of the feed file to ensure proper processing. For example, CSV, JSON, or XML files.

FeedContentLength.description: The size of the feed file in bytes, which is used for validation and processing requirements.

FeedContentName.description: The name of the feed file, which includes identifiers like timestamp or sequence number.

FeedScope.description: Defines the scope or category of the feed. For example, if the feed applies to main, country-specific, or language-specific catalog segments.

PlatformConnections.description: The external channel or destination for syndication.

SyncMode.description: Specifies the type of sync being performed.
